column1: Table 2: Number of sentenced prisoners admitted into and released from state and federal jurisdiction, 2000-2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Table 2. Number of sentenced prisoners admitted into and released from state and federal jurisdiction, 2000-2009
Note: Totals based on prisoners with sentences of more than 1 year. Totals exclude transfers, escapes, and those absent without leave (AWOL).
